name: Butter Chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices.
Cook chicken until lightly browned.
Prepare a sauce with tomatoes, cream, butter, and spices.
Simmer chicken in sauce until tender.
Serve with naan or rice.

reviews.comment: Rich flavor but can be heavy on cream; balance with spice.

name: Chicken Biryani
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices.
Cook rice with whole spices until half-done.
Layer chicken and rice in a pot.
Steam until rice and chicken are fully cooked.
Serve with raita.

reviews.comment: Complex but rewarding; flavors deepen with slow cooking.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Mix eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Combine pasta, pancetta, and egg-cheese mixture off heat.
Season with black pepper and serve.

reviews.comment: Simple yet delicious; timing is key to avoid scrambled eggs.

name: Pizza Margherita
instructions: Preheat oven to high heat.
Stretch dough into a round base.
Spread tomato sauce evenly.
Top with mozzarella and fresh basil.
Bake until crust is golden and cheese is melted.

reviews.comment: Perfect balance of flavors; dough quality makes the difference.
